predicate.note: Frames file for 'intend' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet class intend 29.2, no mention of other members. Comparison with 'plan'.

roleset.name: intend, plan

example.name: typical usage
example.text: ...and a company spokesman said it fully intends to meet the payments.

example.name: passive extraction
example.text: Manville said the shares issued to the trust were intended to be sold, as needed.
example.arg: the shares issued to the trust

roleset.note: That's not a very nice way to handle passive extraction, but it'll have to do.
